text: The Vale of Rheidol Railway () is a railway that runs for between Aberystwyth and Devil's Bridge in the county of Ceredigion, Wales.Johnson 1999, page 15 The Vale of Rheidol Railway has never closed except during wars. The railway celebrated its 100 year anniversary in 2002. ==References== Category:Railway stations in the United Kingdom Category:1902 establishments in Europe Category:1900s establishments in the United Kingdom Category:20th-century establishments in Wales Category:Narrow gauge railways
title: Vale of Rheidol Railway
